data.text: @nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita She is THE BEST❤️❤️❤️🤙🏽 and KINDEST!!!
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita I know her cousin. Both are really great people.
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita Also Fugetsudo is heaven on earth.
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita I met her too. On the set of Joy Luck Club. I can tell you who’s not so nice. Lol!
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita She really does have best quality ❤️
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita Love this! I’ve met her a few times in Vancouver and she is unbelievably generous and kind.
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita Looks like such a fun shop
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita She was the first celebrity I ever met—my parents took a photo of me as a baby meeting her at a SF Japantown Cherry Blossom Festival lol
@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita And not just any mochi shop, that looks like Fugetsu-do! I met Tamlyn at a US-Japan Council conference. She is so gracious and nice.

@nancywyuen @thetamlyntomita 100% agree! Met her at KoreAm Gala in 2018. She kindly recorded a spot speaking out for immigrants' rights for us. She's the most intelligent and gracious of the celebrities. https://t.co/AhdudVuXJc
